name: Portuguese - French Translator
description: With this translator you can easily translate words and text from Portuguese to French and from French to Portuguese. You are able to translate words and even sentences, in just a split second.  This translator contains the following features: - Translate words and sentences - Translate from clipboard - Simple and user-friendly interface - Instant search - Instant start - It helps to learn the language - Can be used as an dictionary - It helps during travelling
